name: The Mechanic Thieves
description:
A Fire Emblem-like game made for the r/SRPGStudio discord's 2019 game jam!

A one-chapter game where you defeat bosses to regain game mechanics, featuring tricky strategy, stupid jokes, and gameplay that quickly evolves. Check out the readme for more of the nitty-gritty details, and some tips!

Thanks for playing!
